name: antlr4ts-root
description: Root project for ANTLR 4 runtime for Typescript

scripts.prepare: npm run buildtool && npm link antlr4ts-cli && npm run antlr4ts && npm run tsc && npm link target/src && npm run buildrts
scripts.unlink: npm unlink antlr4ts && npm unlink target/src && npm unlink antlr4ts-cli && npm run unlinkruntime && npm run unlinktool
scripts.antlr4ts: npm run antlr4ts-runtime-xpath && npm run antlr4ts-test-runtime && npm run antlr4ts-test-pattern && npm run antlr4ts-test-rewriter && npm run antlr4ts-test-xpath && npm run antlr4ts-benchmark
scripts.antlr4ts-test-pattern: cd test/tool && antlr4ts ParseTreeMatcherX1.g4 ParseTreeMatcherX2.g4 ParseTreeMatcherX3.g4 ParseTreeMatcherX4.g4 ParseTreeMatcherX5.g4 ParseTreeMatcherX6.g4 ParseTreeMatcherX7.g4 ParseTreeMatcherX8.g4 -no-listener -DbaseImportPath=../../../../src -o gen/matcher
scripts.antlr4ts-test-rewriter: cd test/tool && antlr4ts RewriterLexer1.g4 RewriterLexer2.g4 RewriterLexer3.g4 -DbaseImportPath=../../../../src -o gen/rewriter
scripts.antlr4ts-benchmark: npm run antlr4ts-benchmark-std && npm run antlr4ts-benchmark-std-atn && npm run antlr4ts-benchmark-lr && npm run antlr4ts-benchmark-lr-atn
scripts.tslint: npm run tslint-runtime && npm run tslint-tests

author: Terence Parr, Sam Harwell, and Burt Harris
